column4: hi all i got a question.. what is the ubuntu desktop package name?
why are you trying to install the desktop?
well i assure you it is ubuntu-desktop
did you add all the ubuntu stuff
just get the freaking ubuntu iso, burn it, install it, and stop dicking around trying to go from debian to ubuntu
yea, good idea, but problem is my "freaking ubuntu iso" wont burn. kthx
yea, rofl, took me about 3 tries to get it working :)
took me two.  i was really tired the first time.  next morning after a good nights sleep i did fine
